full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
**Title:** High Velocity Oxygen Fuel (HVOF) and Plasma Spray Cells

**Reference:** cb-944-48557440
**Publication Date:** January 05, 2024
**Closing Date:** January 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites tenders for a Standing Offer for High Velocity Oxygen Fuel (HVOF) and plasma spray cells. The proposed contract will be awarded through an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) under the Trade Agreement, Revised World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

**Scope of Work:**
The proposed contract involves the development of a combined working cell to accommodate the HVOF and Plasma Spray Laboratories into one new custom-pre-fabricated facility at the NRC Boucherville, QC location. The scope of work includes project management, engineering design, acquisition of materials, systems, and equipment, surplus and decommissioning planning, and system testing and commissioning.

**Technical Requirements:**
The contractor must possess expertise in robotics integration for metal additive manufacturing facilities and have experience in surface preparation, coating/build-up by thermal spray and cold spray, robotic machining and surface finishing, integration of sensors and diagnostics tools, and automation of equipment.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The statement of capabilities must demonstrate how the supplier meets each of the advertised requirements, including a minimum of 10 years of experience in delivering integration projects based on ABB and KUKA robotic platforms and a dedicated specialist with over 15 years of experience in the development and implementation of advanced NDE sensors.

**Trade Agreement:**
The proposed contract is subject to the Canada European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), and other applicable Free Trade Agreements.

**Ineligibility:**
Due to the unique technical requirements of this project, only one supplier is eligible to participate.
